column4: how do I list devices that are connected to my computer (like usb hard drive) which may not be mounted yet?
how do I list devices that are connected to my computer (like usb hard drive) which may not be mounted yet?
with a number after that for partitions (some of those will be internal drives, etc)
when I ls /dev/ I just get a list of every possible device not the ones connected to my computer
Not quite.  You only get devices that exist.  Try this though: ls dev | grep sd
that gives me a list of like 30 devices
Are they sd*? or is the sd just somewhere in them?
I only have one hard drive connect and one external usb drive, trying to figure our the device name for the usb (trying to recover data from it, I murdered it today)
Flannel yet I have like over 30 sd* devices
everything that is sd* (sda, sdb, etc) is a drive.  Everything that is sdx* (sda1 sda2, etc) is a partition on the drive.
well I have like sdg 1-15, sda 1-15, sdf 1-15 all listed
sdh 1-15 so on and so on
that's what I was trying to remember
